item.description:
Bernadette Trafton features Jim Goddard, author of Freedom for a Day, learn how you can remove limitations and have the perfect day!

"What if you believed for just one day that everything would work out perfectly?"

Listen in on Wednesday Jan 20th, 12:00 PM EST as Bernadette Trafton, Co-Founder and Owner of Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association and Host of Multiple Streams of Income, interviews author James Goddard about his book "Freedom for a Day" and learn how YOU can have the perfect day.

You will learn:

To remove your limitations for 24 hours
New tools to counterattack the negativity that is present in your mind (even if you are unaware of it)
How you can achieve whatever you want to achieve
The recipe for freedom and the perfect day.

Bernadette will interview James about why he chose to surrender to the teachings in "The Secret" by Rhonda Byrne and how this special day was the catalyst for his book "Freedom for a Day".

We encourage questions from our audience. Please submit all questions to Bernadette at Bernadette@BostonAREIA.com.

A positve mindset is the beginning of all success. The belief that you can achieve your hearts desire is the first step in achieving it. Join us on Wednesday Jan 20th at 12:00 PM EST to learn how you can set your mindset to positive and achieve all of your goals for 2010!

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Jim Goddard - Radio Show - Multiple Streams of Income with Bernadette Trafton
